title: Henry's on the Market
description: Multi-level historic venue featuring a spacious roof deck with views of the bustling Market area. Craft cocktails, live music, and a lively vibe perfect for nights out.
searchHint: Henry's on the Market 54 N Market St Charleston SC

title: Pour Taproom
description: Highest rooftop bar in Charleston with panoramic views of downtown. Self-pour craft beers from over 30 taps, with a casual, innovative vibe for beer enthusiasts.
searchHint: Pour Taproom 560 King St Charleston SC

title: Revelry Brewing Rooftop
description: Elevated rooftop at the brewery with urban city views. House-brewed beers and casual bites in a relaxed, laid-back brewery atmosphere.
searchHint: Revelry Brewing Rooftop 10 Conroy St Charleston SC

title: Rosemary Rose
description: Chic rooftop bar atop the Nickle Hotel with views of downtown Charleston. Specialty cocktails with an elegant French Riviera-inspired vibe.
searchHint: Rosemary Rose 529 King St Charleston SC

title: Bridge Bar at Charleston Harbor Fish House
description: Elevated bar with stunning views of Charleston Harbor, the Ravenel Bridge, and Fort Sumter. Craft cocktails and fresh seafood plates with a waterfront vibe.
searchHint: Bridge Bar at Charleston Harbor Fish House 32 Patriots Point Rd Mount Pleasant SC

title: Charleston Crab House
description: Upper-level balcony with scenic views of Wappoo Creek. Seafood-inspired cocktails and drinks with a relaxed, coastal waterfront vibe.
searchHint: Charleston Crab House 145 Wappoo Creek Dr Charleston SC

title: Loggerhead's Beach Grill
description: Elevated open-air deck with direct ocean views on Folly Beach. Craft cocktails, beer, and seafood with a beachy, music-filled vibe.
searchHint: Loggerhead's Beach Grill 123 W Ashley Ave Folly Beach SC

title: Pier 101 Restaurant & Bar
description: Situated on the Folly Beach Pier with expansive ocean views. Drinks and light bites with live music in a casual beachfront atmosphere.
searchHint: Pier 101 Restaurant & Bar 101 E Arctic Ave Folly Beach SC

title: Coconut Joe's Beach Grill
description: Rooftop bar with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Full bar with tequila specialties and beach fare in a laid-back island setting.
searchHint: Coconut Joe's Beach Grill 1120 Ocean Blvd Isle of Palms SC

title: The Boathouse at Breach Inlet
description: Rooftop bar with views of the Intracoastal Waterway and Atlantic Ocean. Craft cocktails and fresh seafood in a fine yet casual dining atmosphere.
searchHint: The Boathouse at Breach Inlet 101 Palm Blvd Isle of Palms SC
